main event: A UFO was observed approaching the observer, making maneuvers, and then departing, appearing as a solid ring shape with a black exhaust trail.
interesting points: The UFO approached within 5 miles and displayed intelligent control with quick directional changes., The observation lasted for approximately 15 minutes., The witnesses used 28-power telescope or 25-power binoculars to view the object., The object had a bright light, brighter than the North Star, and moved at high speed., No sound was heard and the object disappeared by fading into the background.
sighted object: a round object with a dark white light
